definition: complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.chinese: 投訴的信件潮湧般寄來。

sentences.english: Complaints about standards of service should be addressed to the proprietor.
sentences.chinese: 對服務態度有意見者可向老闆投訴。

sentences.english: What are the 3rd party hosted service for form processing to avoid PCI complaince?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是第三方託管格式處理以避免PCI投訴服務？

sentences.english: The IC3 is the clearinghouse for online crime complaints in the U. S.
sentences.chinese: IC3是美國爲網絡犯罪投訴設置的交易所。

sentences.english: Here's how three businesses are dealing with their Yelp complainers.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是三家企業如何處理他們的聲投訴者。

sentences.english: We are handling your complaints, and we will call you back in 3 to 7 working-days.
sentences.chinese: 你的投訴我們已經受理，三至七個工作日會給您迴音。

sentences.english: Helpful Customers Make complaints to help your business get better.
sentences.chinese: 有益的投訴者客戶的投訴促進你的業務發展。

sentences.english: Helpful Customers Make complaints to help your business get better.
sentences.chinese: 有益的投訴者客戶的投訴促進你的業務發展。

sentences.english: The Apple support Web site filled up with messages from apoplectic customers.
sentences.chinese: Apple客服網站塞滿了憤怒的用戶投訴郵件。

sentences.english: Plese input the following word and send your report.
sentences.chinese: 要投訴，請輸入下面的英語單詞。

sentences.english: Passive Customers Complain to all their friends about you.
sentences.chinese: 消極型的投訴者客戶把對你的抱怨告訴所有的朋友。

sentences.english: In states where unemployment didn't climb as much, claims dropped.
sentences.chinese: 在失業率升幅較小的州，男性的投訴率反而下降。

sentences.english: You are advised to keep a copy of this completed form for reference.
sentences.chinese: 閣下應保留一份填妥的投訴表格副本，以備參考。

sentences.english: Some complained that their children were allocated places in areas such as Tseung Kwan O.
sentences.chinese: 有些家長投訴子女被派到將軍澳等地區。

sentences.english: You suffer my imperfections and my shortcomings largely without complaint.
sentences.chinese: 你叫我的侷限性和缺點在很大程度上零投訴。

definition: to report (malefactors to the police)/to denounce
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
